Name: sprint_goal_must_be_met
Description: The Sprint Goal achievement status must be marked as 'Achieved'.

Name: worker_availability_not_exceeded
Description: A worker's total assigned task effort cannot exceed their availability.

Name: critical_skills_must_be_covered
Description: For any task requiring a certified skill (level>=4)
IsSum: a worker with that skill must be assigned.

Name: high_severity_blockers_must_resolved
Description: No active blocker with severity greater than 8 (on a scale of 10) is allowed at sprint end.

Name: team_must_have_scrum_master
Description: Every active team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned.

Name: user_story_must_have_acceptance
Description: No User Story in the sprint backlog can have empty acceptance_criteria.

Name: task_must_have_assignee
Description: Every task in the 'In Progress' or 'To Do' column of the Scrum Board must be assigned to at least one worker.

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total cost of the project (derived from effort * cost rate) must not exceed the project budget.

Name: feature_documentation_complete
Description: Any feature marked for release must have its documentation status marked as 'Complete'.
